short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extensions for Chrome giving you the ability to save a large number of links.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: By default, only 10 quick links are available in the browser. The extension allows you to add more quick links. It has a more pleasant appearance.
